title: Josiah Trenchard Part Five Belatu-Cadros
description: An alternate cover edition can be found here and here‘What is it? Every once in a while someone mentions “Belatu-Cadros” like it’s a magic word! It was just another battle, wasn’t it?’ Just who is this man Josiah Trenchard? Why did he join the Space Navy? What did happen on Mars four years ago that made him into the man that he is? For that matter, what does Martian spider really taste like? These questions and more will be answered as we follow the career of Josiah Trenchard from a boy to a man. He learns to fight, learns to love and learns to hate with a vengeance. Belatu-Cadros was the first major battle in the war against the Insurgents. It is a battle that will see his friends killed, his enemies prosper and his very first meeting with a certain Japanese assassin… SPOILER NOTICE: Although this episode is in essence a prequel, it is advisory to read parts one through four first to avoid spoilers.
author: Jonathon Fletcher
